aircraft.value: Spectre Night - AC-8325-549 at Zone-1 Facility

defect_observed.value: Hydraulic fluid contamination detected. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Brake System component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 28/09/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 01/10/2024 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 30/09/2024 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 04/10/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 05/10/2024 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Hydraulic fluid contamination detected. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Brake System component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: M - Other Reasons
